name: Break out (Lawrencz Studios)
description:
Break out is based on a c64 [Comodore 64] game, named Krakout.

The music of the game is the original Krakout music, what I downloaded from YouTube. I am not responsible if Break out does not work or launch on iOS!

Try it out and have fun whit it.

I almost forgot. The game was made in Unity, if anyone is interested.
